project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a Python quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions, tracks the score, and displays it at the end.

task.name: Design the structure for storing questions and answers
Implement the function to display questions and capture user input
Create the scoring system to track user responses and scores
Implement the game logic to loop through questions and evaluate answers
Display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for each of the implemented features, including questions display, scoring, and game logic
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
